7.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan (The Call to Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Sa'eed bin Jubair said concerning Ibn 'Umar:"We were with him (Ibn 'Umar) in Jam' (Muzdalifah), and he called the Adhan, then the Iqamah, then he led us in praying Maghrib. Then he said: 'The prayer,' and he led us in praying 'Isha', two Rak'ahs. I said: 'What is this prayer?' He said: 'This is how I prayed with the Messenger of Allah (S.A.W) in this place

chapter.ara-name: باب الأَذَانِ لِمَنْ جَمَعَ بَيْنَ الصَّلاَتَيْنِ بَعْدَ ذَهَابِ وَقْتِ الأُولَى مِنْهُمَا
chapter.eng-name: The Adhan For One Who Is Combining Two Prayers After The Time Of The First Prayer Has Gone
